mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zzupzzup.MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ROLE, PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, LOGIN_TYPE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memberRole}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{loginType}, #{ageRange}, #{gender}, #{profileImage}, #{nickname}, #{statusMessage})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE, ACTIVITY_SCORE, MANNER_SCORE, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_TYPE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};

SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ROLE, MEMBER_PHONE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE, ACTIVITY_SCORE, MANNER_SCORE, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_TYPE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup.MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_ROLE = 'user'

SELECT zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_ROLE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_PHONE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.PROFILE_IMAGE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.NICKNAME, zzupzzup.MEMBER.STATUS_MESSAGE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.REG_DATE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.DELETE_DATE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.DELETE_TYPE, zzupzzup.MEMBER.BLACKLIST_REG_DATE, zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID, zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.RESTAURANT_NAME, zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.JUDGE_STATUS, zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.RESTAURANT_REG_DATE, zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.REQUEST_DATE, zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.JUDGE_DATE FROM zzupzzup.RESTAURANT, zzupzzup.MEMBER WHERE zzupzzup.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID AND zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_ROLE = 'owner' AND zzupzzup.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NO, MEMBER_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.MEMBER ) MEMBER_LIST WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0) = 0

SELECT COUNT(CHAT_MEMBER_ID) AS COUNT_REPORT FROM zzupzzup_test.REPORT, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER WHERE zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ROLE = 'user' AND zzupzzup_test.REPORT.CHAT_MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID AND zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = 'hihi@b.com'

SELECT COUNT(RESTAURANT_NO) AS COUNT_RESTAURANT FROM zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER WHERE zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ROLE = 'owner' AND zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID
